name: Plant Girl FRONTIER
description:
At the enlistment ceremony of a certain castle, the hero who was able to equip the legendary ring for some reason
Three girls who are descendants of a race called plant girls
A base search RPG that techs the dungeon while strengthening it.

・ Defeat the area boss of the dungeon, return to the base and train at the etch.
You can take it off or leave it on.
As the story progresses, you will be able to train twice a night or omit the H scene.

・ Since the heroines have no such thing as likability
Kakafufu without any thoughts.
As always, the girls talk a lot this time as well.

-All monsters are newly written.
Girl-type monsters are strong and rare
I feel that the area of ​​the cloth is getting smaller.

・ I think it's okay if you haven't played the past Plant Girl.

-The saved data of the trial version can be carried over to the product version.
See the readme file for details.
